mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mydata (data_title, data_img_list, data_img_mx, data_url, data_good, data_dir, data_type, data_country, data_year, data_note, count_people, count_score, gmt_create ) VALUES (#{data_title}, #{data_img_list}, #{data_img_mx}, #{data_url}, #{data_good}, #{data_dir}, #{data_type}, #{data_country}, #{data_year}, #{data_note}, #{count_people}, #{count_score}, #{gmt_create} )
